sense.def:
To hug someone
pomeni položiti roke okoli neke osebe in jo tesno stisniti k sebi, ker jo imamo radi ali smo veseli, da jo vidimo.

seg.quote: During our infancy, our parents cuddle and hug us.
In an instant we were hugging and kissing.
He greeted his mother with a hug.

sense.def:
To hug something
pomeni nekaj tesno oviti z rokami in stisniti k telesu.

seg.quote: ...a basket which she hugged tight on her lap.
